mean_cn: adj. 充满忿恨的，厌恶的
mean_en: having or showing a feeling of anger or displeasure about someone or something unfair
word_etyma: re向后，相反+sent感觉+ful形容词后缀，…的 → 不满的，忿恨的
sentence: She was resentful that he could sleep while his snoring kept her awake.
sentence_trans: 她因为他的鼾声无法入睡，但是他却能睡得很香，这一点让她非常讨厌他！
